text: allāhvuṭaiya aruḷ koṭaiyiliruntu yātoṉṟaiyum peṟat tāṅkaḷ caktiyuṭaiyavarkaḷallar eṉṟu vētattai uṭaiyavarkaḷ eṇṇik koḷḷātirukkum poruṭṭē (ivaṟṟai avaṉ uṅkaḷukku aṟivikkiṉṟāṉ) aṉṟiyum aruḷ koṭaiyellām niccayamāka allāhviṉ kaiyilēyē irukkiṉṟatu, tāṉ virumpiyavarkaḷukku ataṉai avaṉ aḷikkiṉṟāṉ - allāhvē makattāṉa kirupaiyuṭaiyavaṉ
